aws_db_subnet_group.description: Provides an RDS DB subnet group resource.

name.description: The name of the DB subnet group. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

description.description: The description of the DB subnet group. Defaults to "Managed by Terraform".

subnet_ids.description: A list of VPC subnet IDs.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

arn.description: The ARN of the db subnet group.
